name: Vivald Runner
description:
Vivald is an adventurer who was born with the art of switching between four seasons (Summer, spring, winter and autumn), every change is extreme, causing him some kind of weakness, which means you'll have to switch between seasons properly while running, exploring your new home!

Warning, may contain flashy images!

------------------------------------------------------------

Z, SPACE = Jump (you can jump up to 3 times)

Arrow keys = Changes the season

Every season changing cures the previous negative effect, but gives you a new one:

(⬅) The ground is too hot during SUMMER

(➞) Too many time spent on WINTER causes him freezing damage

(⬆) SPRING flowers make him sneeze since Vivald is allergic :(

(⬇) AUTUMN leaves can make your vision harder
